com.philips.pins.shinelib

Interface SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SHNAssociationProcedure
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SHNAssociationProcedureNearestDevice

    public interface SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin
extends SHNAssociationProcedure
    A procedure used to associate with a peripheral. An associationProcedure is intended to be started and stopped by SHNDeviceAssociation. If association is successful then the peripheral is stored by SHNDeviceAssociation in the list of associated devices. In case association procedure needs to expose information to the client of the BlueLib, it should always use the user handler obtained by SHNCentral.getUserHandler().

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin.SHNAssociationProcedureListener
      Interface that provides updates for the association result.

      This callback is used by SHNDeviceScanner to report discovered peripherals.
      boolean getShouldScan()
      Specifies if SHNDeviceScanner is used for scanning for the peripheral.
      void scannerTimeout()
      This callback is used by SHNDeviceScanner to indicate scanning timed out.
      void setShnAssociationProcedureListener(SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin.SHNAssociationProcedureListener SHNAssociationProcedureListener)
      Provides a means to attach a listener for the association procedure.
      SHNResult start()
      SHNDeviceAssociation calls start on the association procedure and reports the error to the user if the start result is not SHNResult.SHNOk.
      void stop()
      SHNDeviceAssociation calls stop on the association procedure.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        SHNResult start()
        SHNDeviceAssociation calls start on the association procedure and reports the error to the user if the start result is not SHNResult.SHNOk. Callbacks for the association results are provided via SHNAssociationProcedureListener.
        Returns:
        result of the association procedure start

      • stop

        void stop()
        SHNDeviceAssociation calls stop on the association procedure. Callbacks for the association results are provided via SHNAssociationProcedureListener.

      • getShouldScan

        boolean getShouldScan()
        Specifies if SHNDeviceScanner is used for scanning for the peripheral.
        Returns:
        true if SHNDeviceScanner needs to be used, false otherwise

      • deviceDiscovered

        void deviceDiscovered(SHNDevice shnDevice,
                      SHNDeviceFoundInfo shnDeviceFoundInfo)
        This callback is used by SHNDeviceScanner to report discovered peripherals.
        Parameters:
        shnDevice - an instance of SHNDevice corresponding to the discovered peripheral
        shnDeviceFoundInfo - an instance of SHNDeviceFoundInfo that give additional information like RSSI

      • scannerTimeout

        void scannerTimeout()
        This callback is used by SHNDeviceScanner to indicate scanning timed out.

      • setShnAssociationProcedureListener

        void setShnAssociationProcedureListener(SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin.SHNAssociationProcedureListener SHNAssociationProcedureListener)
        Provides a means to attach a listener for the association procedure.
        Parameters:
        SHNAssociationProcedureListener - an instance of the listener to receive callbacks
